question: thought i'd post this info due to the fact that over time i have seen a few posts from time to time about people using seroquel for one reason or another in or part of their treatment....there is a HUGE lawsuit going on in the U.S.  involving over 2000 people who have taken this drug, as it has caused healthy people to be stricken with diabetes and other problems...would advise anyone on here who is taking this drug to talk with their doctor asap...........
title: seroquel warning
